title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practice Competency: Microlearning for Enhancing English as a Foreign Language (EFL) Instructional Design Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English proficiency and basic understanding of instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design learning activities that promote higher-order thinking skills by applying scaffolding techniques.
Learners can establish personalized learning objectives considering learner characteristics and learning theories.
Learners can design summative assessments using diverse evaluation tools that reflect real-world language contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
